body_html: No because once you create a cycle of strong references your only chance is getting Python GC to detect it's unreachable. However, this cycle is entirely in our C++ backend, so it's invisible to the GC.

body: No because once you create a cycle of strong references your only chance is getting Python GC to detect it's unreachable. However, this cycle is entirely in our C++ backend, so it's invisible to the GC.
